attributes.additional_details: G4S, having received large scale contracts across governments, should be severely penalised, alongside those who appointed them and failed to monitor them whilst dishonouring their contract. Drafted soldiers need to be given better active and long term compensation than a few tickets and right to buy parking. Failure to make savings on the budget by spending more of it to compensate for inadequate external tenders may not increase costs as Teresa Mays claims, but will reduce savings on resources to commit to any credible Olympic Legacy back into the limited national resource the current goverment constantly remind us they inherited. Seems they are in cross party agreement that they are all at fault
